abstract: Manhattan furnishings boutique Future Perfect sells recycled wood furniture by acclaimed Dutch designer Piet Hein Eek.
snippet: For the first time, furniture by the Dutch designer, who is known for using recycled materials, will be available in the United States.
lead_paragraph: For the first time, furniture by the Dutch designer, who is known for using recycled materials, will be available in the United States.

headline.main: Piet Hein Eek Designs at the Future Perfect
headline.seo: Piet Hein Eek Designs at the Future Perfect in New York
